Title: zAnimation
Description: zAnimation is a simple XNA library for animating skinned models exported from Maya. It supports pre-clip interpolation and per-bone animations. It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
zAnimation is a simple XNA library for animating skinned models exported from Maya. It supports pre-clip interpolation and per-bone animations. It's developed in C#.

Current testing done on Windows XP SP3 only.

Current version: 1.0
Wanted: Windows testers, XBOX360 programmers

No documentation or samples yet. Stay tuned.

More on zAnimation and other cool stuff on my blog http://onedevarmy.wordpress.com/.
